str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Come hither, come, hither, an exclamatory word. From deuro and an imperative form of eimi; come hither!
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Lonesome, i.e. waste.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From ana and pauo; to repose (be exempt), remain); by implication, to refresh.
Puny; especially neuter somewhat.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Much, many; often.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To come, go.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To go away, depart, begone, die. From hupo and ago; to lead under, i.e. Withdraw or retire, literally or figuratively.
And, even, also, namely.

word: they did not even have time
parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From eukairos; to have good time, i.e. Opportunity or leisure.
A primary verb; to eat.
